content: it sits more on top of your head instead of behind it the pom-­ pom should still be large enough to cover the gathered point where the hat was closed a note on sizing bonnet-­ style hats can be difficult to fit since the hat doesn t wrap around the circumference of your head i recommend using the front edge measurement on the right below to determine band size measure from below your ear at your jawline over your head to the jawline on the other side then choose a band length based on that measurement if you re between sizes you may want to size up or add a few more garter edge row to increase the length slightly pattern and images copyright 2012-­ 2014 lacey volk aka volkstricken this free pattern is provided for personal use only contact lacey volk@gmail com http //blog volkstricken com
